name: Prophecy
description:
Prophecy is a mythological Auto Battler where you build a team of gods, demi-gods, and mythical creatures to defeat your opposition in battle.

A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE EVERY GAME
Every game of Prophecy is a unique experience with different units, traits, and items that change the way you play.

POWERFUL LEADERS
Lead your army with a powerful leader from many of the world’s different mythologies. Play as Zeus, Odin, Athena, Poseidon, and many more. Leaders offer many different play styles with unique abilities.

BUILD THE WAY YOU WANT
With over 50 different units, 40 different items, and 40 different traits, there are countless options when building your team. Build a team of ruthless assassins or even a wall of impenetrable tanks.

RANKED COMPETITION
Play in the ranked mode to compete against the best and improve your rating.
